page.title: 10A day at school 1
page.content: The first job that Fiona did with her friend Suzanne was to read a poem in class.The poem was called" If you don't put your shoes on before I count 15".Fiona had been sorted to write a poem, then read a poem and write about it.She was doing her first poem about sports day.She had to copy the beginning of the sports day poem off the board and then do the rest herself At 10. 45 it was play time she played a ball game.You play it like this.The person who is on says "If you have a brother." Then the person throws the ball,and if you have a brother you catch it,then you're on.At 11.00am Fiona went to recorders with her recorder group.They are going to play "Annie's song".They went to practice near the office.After they had practiced they went back into the hall.
